text: WISEPC J150649.97+702736.0 is a brown dwarf star of the spectral class T6. It is located in the constellation Ursa Minor. The star is one of the Sun's nearest neighbors, at a distance of 16.85 light years. Brown dwarfs closer to the Sun include Luhman 16 and WISE 0855−0714. Other brown dwarfs that may be closer to the Sun includes the ε Indi star system at 11.8 light-years and WISE 0350-5658 at 17.7 light years. == References == Category:Stars
title: WISE 1506+7027
